DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Paradise Face Paint Refill- Brilliant Lt Blue/Bleu Bebe 0.25 oz
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron's Paradise AQ makeup is a water activated face paint that is rich in color and pigment. The Metallic colors add a bit of sheen to your designs. These are refills for the 8 and 30 color palettes.
Paradise face paints are semi-soft cake makeup co-created with Mehron by Jinny Houle, World Renowned Body Painting Artist. Paradise face paints are water activated, and because of this, the hues of the colors can be controlled by the artist. Paradise Face Paints feature vibrant colors that dry quickly with minimal rub-off, yet are easy to blend and wash off. Paradise Makeup includes aloe and chamomile and the enriching emollients glycerin, avocado oil and cocoa butter, making them safe and gentle on skin. They have rich, vibrant, color-saturated coverage--more than ordinary makeup, yet it's water-soluble for easy soap and water removal.
These Paradise AQ Face Paint containers are 1.4 ounces or 40 grams.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.25 ounce (7 gm) Paradise Brilliant Face Paint Refill can be used for 50 applications
The Brilliant Paradise Metallic colors add a little sheen to your designs
Made with aloe, chamomile and the enriching emollients glycerin, avocado oil and cocoa butter
Easy to blend and apply yet are resistant to smearing.
Mehron has taken face and body painting to a new level with their Brilliant Paradise AQ Paints
